problemStatement: Create a simple calculator that performs basic arithmetic operations.
approach: Developed a web application using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to handle user input and display results.

problemStatement: Build a to-do list application with local storage functionality.

lessonsLearned: Gained experience in working with APIs and handling asynchronous data fetching.
